instruction: Change the prescription of Fluticasone propionate 220 mcg/actuation inhaler, 2 puffs twice daily.
Rinse and spit after every dose of Fluticasone to prevent side effects like hoarseness, white patches, and sore throat.

attributes.comment: Rinse and spit after every dose of Fluticasone to prevent side effects like hoarseness, white patches, and sore throat.

instruction: Keep the Albuterol inhaler on hand, with a maximum of four-to-six puffs in 24 hours.

attributes.comment: Keep the Albuterol inhaler on hand, with a maximum of four-to-six puffs in 24 hours.
